content.title: Marshall Gittler's Market Outlook: USD up, EUR down on risk-off; UK CPI, FOMC minutes
content.text: A typical “risk off” profile to the FX market: CHF and JPY were the two best-performing currencies, while the commodity currencies were the biggest

content.title: Endurance is one of the most important qualities of a trader
content.text: When a trend dominates the market, few doubt who controls the situation.
